fact.description: The match has started.
Italy drive forward but Claudio Marchisio is judged offside.
Costa Rica's Christian Bolanos is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Costa Rica in their own half.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Costa Rica have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Celso Borges (Costa Rica) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
Throw-in Costa Rica.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Corner awarded to Italy.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Italy a goal kick.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Costa Rica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Italy.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Recife Italy's Ignazio Abate is caught offside.
Costa Rica have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Italy's half.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Italy's half?
Corner awarded to Costa Rica.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Italy's half?
Goal kick for Italy at Arena Pernambuco.
Throw-in for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Enrique Roberto Osses blows against Italy's Mario Balotelli for offside.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy.
Thiago Motta for Italy gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Costa Rica a goal kick.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Italy's half.
Throw-in for Italy in their own half.
Italy have a goal kick.
Mario Balotelli of Italy gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Italy drive forward and Mario Balotelli gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Italy's Matteo Darmian has run offside.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Christian Bolanos of Costa Rica smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Italy's half?
Throw-in for Italy at Arena Pernambuco.
Italy's Mario Balotelli is whistled for offside at Arena Pernambuco.
Costa Rica push forward through Bryan Ruiz, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Costa Rica.
Christian Bolanos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Costa Rica.
Oscar Duarte's header is off-target for Costa Rica.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
Mario Balotelli (Italy) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Great play from Junior Diaz to set up the goal.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the first half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy.
Enrique Roberto Osses blows to end the first-half.
Antonio Cassano is on a sub for Thiago Motta for Italy.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Italy have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Joel Campbell of Costa Rica is pulled up for offside.
Costa Rica have been awarded a corner by Enrique Roberto Osses.
Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Italy a goal kick.
In Recife, Antonio Cassano of Italy is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick Italy.
Matteo Darmian for Italy drives towards goal at Arena Pernambuco. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Italy.
Free kick Italy.
Italy's Andrea Pirlo is on target but unsuccessful.
Antonio Cassano for Italy is whistled offside.
In Recife Costa Rica drive forward through Celso Borges. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Costa Rica.
Mario Balotelli for Italy is whistled offside.
Cesare Prandelli is making the team's second substitution at Arena Pernambuco with Lorenzo Insigne replacing Antonio Candreva.
Italy needs to be cautious. Costa Rica have an attacking throw-in.
Enrique Roberto Osses blows against Costa Rica's Christian Bolanos for offside.
Costa Rica's Joel Campbell is whistled for offside at Arena Pernambuco.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Costa Rica.
In Recife Italy's Lorenzo Insigne is caught offside.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Cassano of Italy smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Italy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Costa Rica in their own half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Goal kick for Italy at Arena Pernambuco.
In Recife Italy's Lorenzo Insigne is caught offside.
Costa Rica make their first substitution with Jose Cubero replacing Yeltsin Tejeda.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Italy's Mario Balotelli has been booked in Recife.
Cesare Prandelli (Italy) is making a third substitution, with Alessio Cerci replacing Claudio Marchisio.
Free kick Italy.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy.
Jose Cubero for Costa Rica has been booked by Enrique Roberto Osses and receives a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Alessio Cerci of Italy is pulled up for offside.
Marcos Urena is replacing Joel Campbell for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Italy.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Costa Rica goal kick.
Free kick Italy.
Jorge Luis Pinto (Costa Rica) is making a third substitution, with Randall Brenes replacing Bryan Ruiz.
Italy's Lorenzo Insigne breaks free at Arena Pernambuco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Free kick Italy.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Italy's half.
Marcos Urena (Costa Rica) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Italy at Arena Pernambuco.
Italy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Italy's Alessio Cerci has run offside.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Italy.
Italy's Antonio Cassano misses with an attempt on goal.
Enrique Roberto Osses awards Costa Rica a goal kick.
The second half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Enrique Roberto Osses signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Italy's half.
Costa Rica's Randall Brenes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Italy have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Italy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
